description.narrative: Founded in 1998, Globaltronics for Electronics SAE ('Gtronics' or the 'Company' - http://www.gtronics.com/ ), a leading fully integrated Egyptian manufacturer of electricity management solutions, specializes in the development and manufacture of power meters including smart digital meters, prepaid meters and provides smart grid solutions in addition to Meter Management Systems (MMS). IFC is considering a USD10m preferred equity investment in Globaltronics. The proposed investment will be used to (i) finance increased working capital for the greater expected sales and inventory of the Government of Egypt's mechanical meter replacement cycle; (ii) finance Globaltronics' overseas expansion plans, including in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (KSA) and Eastern Europe; and (iii) finance additional R&D and enhance the tendering department to be able to effectively compete in several African and Middle Eastern countries and meet their technical requirements, in addition to developing new products (the Project).

The Project is expected to have (a) economy-wide effects through (i) increased production of digital electricity meters and linkages to domestically available inputs, and (ii) increased direct, indirect and induced jobs; and (b) stakeholder impacts through improved electricity distribution networks, more efficient energy demand management, and decrease of network losses.
Beyond the Project, IFC also anticipates that as one of the largest and most sophisticated digital meter manufacturing plants in the country, the Project will have a strong effect on the integration of the manufacturing sector in Egypt via the building of economic complexity.
